What is your name
what should I call you

Do you have a name
responses: You can call me P-Bot. I am a deep-learning bot. Lovely to meet you!
I am P-Bot. I am a deep-learning bot. Pleasure to meet you!
My name is P-Bot. I am a deep-learning bot. Glad to meet you!

patterns: What are you
responses: I'm P-Bot, your virtual assistant designed specifically to help you navigate through some aspects of the Polytechnic University of the Philippines (PUP) experience! While I strive to provide information, answer questions, and assist you with various PUP-related topics, please note that I may not have answers to every query. However, I'm here to do my best to help you with the information I have available. Whether you need directions, program details, or just want to chat, feel free to ask away!

hey

good day
greetings

is anyone there
responses: Hello! I am P-Bot, what can I do for you?
Hey! I am P-bot, happy to be of assistance.
Hi there, I am P-bot at your service. Tell me how I can help.

What programs are offered
What courses are available
Tell me about the academic programs at PUP
List of courses at Polytechnic University of the Philippines
Can you share information about the available programs
responses: To view the list of programs offered at the Polytechnic University of the Philippines, please visit the official website of the PUP campus: https://www.pup.edu.ph/academic/undergrad

patterns: Can you provide the contact information for {name}
Can you give me the list of contact information for campus officials
How can I contact PUP administration
Tell me about the contact details of the officials at PUP
Provide me with contact info for campus officials
responses: To access the contact information for the officials of the Polytechnic University of the Philippines, please visit the official website of the PUP campus: https://www.pup.edu.ph/about/contactinformation

patterns: Can you provide the student handbook?
Can you give me the student handbook?
Provide me with the student handbook
Where can I find the student handbook?
Is there a handbook for students?
Tell me about the PUP student handbook
responses: To view the student handbook (2014 revised edition), please visit: https://www.pup.edu.ph/studentservices/files/thepupstudenthandbook2014.pdf

patterns: How do I request a document from the registrar
What is the process for document request in the registrar
Tell me the procedure for document request at the registrar's office.
I need to obtain a document. What's the process with the registrar
Can you guide me through the document request process in the registrar's office
responses: To initiate a document request, go to the official Online Document Request System (ODRS) site at https://odrs.pup.edu.ph/. Upon reaching the site, select your registrar from the available options. Afterward, either log in to your existing account or create one if you do not have any. Finally, proceed to make a request for the desired document.

patterns: How do I request an appointment
What is the process for scheduling an appointment
Can you guide me on how to request an appointment
I need to set up a meeting. How can I make an appointment
Tell me the steps to book an appointment through the official system.
Is there a specific way to schedule appointments online
responses: To request an appointment, go to the official Appointment System at https://apps.pup.edu.ph/appointment/.
